pkgmetadata.longdescription: ======pycmus======A python library for sending commands to the cmus music player:https://cmus.github.io/It uses the same socket interface as the cmus-remote command.Complete documentation is here: http://pycmus.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Usage=====Using pycmus is pretty straightforward you just need to init a PyCmus objectand then issue commands to it. For example:: from pycmus import remote cmus = remote.PyCmus() print(cmus.status())will connect to a running cmus instance (with the socket file in the defaultlocation) and print the player status.For a complete API documentation see: :ref:`pycmus_api`.
